thread.title: YAFM light only showing up on models..?

post.author: necros
post.body: i was trying out the YAFM (http://neherson.narod.ru/) and for some reason, the flashlight light only shows up on models. the light doesn't show up on world geometry... it's very strange. anyone experience this and know what's up?

post.author: necros
post.body: i was trying out the YAFM (http://neherson.narod.ru/) and for some reason, the flashlight light only shows up on models. the light doesn't show up on world geometry... it's very strange. anyone experience this and know what's up?
